title: President Wife is A Man - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Calm Protagonist   Cohabitation   Cold Love Interests   College/University   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Family   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Modern Day   Office Romance   Popular Love Interests   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Secret Relationship   Wealthy Characters
author: 橘子味
description:
A rookie clerk asked his senior curiously: I heard our President is already married?

His senior calmly replied: Correct!

The rookie clerk continued to ask: The President's wife is the former manager Jiang Qi, right?

The latter impatiently replied: The whole company already knows!

The rookie clerk stared at the other’s face: But… isn't Manager Jiang a man?

His senior glared: Nonsense, if he is not a man then is he a woman?

The rookie clerk felt wronged: “……………….”>
